patch 8.1.1365: source command doesn't check for the sandbox

Problem:    Source command doesn't check for the sandbox. (Armin Razmjou)
Solution:   Check for the sandbox when sourcing a file.
attachments.title: patch 8.1.1365: source command doesn't check for the sandbox
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.1365: source command doesn't check for the sandbox

Problem:    Source command doesn't check for the sandbox. (Armin Razmjou)
Solution:   Check for the sandbox when sourcing a file.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.1366: using expressions in a modeline is unsafe

Problem:    Using expressions in a modeline is unsafe.
Solution:   Disallow using expressions in a modeline, unless the
            'modelineexpr' option is set.  Update help, add more tests.
attachments.title: patch 8.1.1366: using expressions in a modeline is unsafe
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.1366: using expressions in a modeline is unsafe

Problem:    Using expressions in a modeline is unsafe.
Solution:   Disallow using expressions in a modeline, unless the
            'modelineexpr' option is set.  Update help, add more tests.
